typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['Sales.txt']) ~> sales
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SalesNew.txt']) ~> salesNew
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SalesUpdate.txt']) ~> salesUpdate
sales, salesNew union(byName: true)~> Unionsales
Unionsales, salesUpdate union(byName: true)~> UnionUpdates
